thread.title: BRIEF-Rhythm Pharmaceuticals Q1 Loss Per Share $0.60

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rhythm Pharmaceuticals Q1 Loss Per Share $0.60
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Rhythm Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* RHYTHM PHARMACEUTICALS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.60 * AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS WERE $136.5 MILLION
* EXISTING CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS, SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS WILL BE SUFFICIENT TO FUND OPERATIONS INTO H2 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
